description: AI domain provides an AI risk score given a domain url.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

compliances.description: The list of compliance provided by the domain.
compliances.title: compliances

dataSharing.description: Does the provider share user data with 3rd party or services.
dataSharing.title: dataSharing

dataSharingConsent.description: Does the provider share user data with consent with 3rd party or services.
dataSharingConsent.title: dataSharingConsent

description.description: A brief description about the AI domain and what services it provides.
description.title: description

domain.description: The domain of the AI provider.
domain.title: domain

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

isAIDomain.description: Flag to say if the domain is a AI domain or not.
isAIDomain.title: isAIDomain

models.description: List of AI models used by the domain.
models.title: models

propagate.description: Propagates the object to all child namespaces. This is always true.
propagate.title: propagate

providerName.description: The name of the main provider.
providerName.title: providerName

providerRetentionPolicies.description: The data retention policies by the domain for each type of users.
providerRetentionPolicies.title: providerRetentionPolicies

providerTrainingPolicies.description: Does the provider use user data for training its model.
providerTrainingPolicies.title: providerTrainingPolicies

riskExplanation.description: A Markdown formatted string explaining the risk score.
riskExplanation.title: riskExplanation

riskScore.description: The risk score for the domain.
riskScore.title: riskScore

thirdPartyModelUsage.description: Does provider use third party model.
thirdPartyModelUsage.title: thirdPartyModelUsage

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: AIDomain
